def sc(s):
    return "".join(ch for ch in s if ch.upper() in s and ch.lower() in s);

def sc(s):
    return ''.join([e for e in s if { 1:e.upper() in s, 0:e.lower() in s}[e.islower()]] )

def sc(s):
    return ''.join(i for i in s if i.swapcase() in set(s))

def sc(s):
    return "".join([i for i in s if i.lower() in s and i.upper() in s])

def sc(s):
    return ''.join(c for c in s if c.swapcase() in s)
